title: Pied piper of Hamelin: and Cinderella
brief_description: Animated puppet adaptions of two traditional tales. 1. “The Pied piper of Hamelin” who lures away the children of a village after the councillors fail to fulfil their part of the contract. Using rhyming verse and rich language of the original poem. 2. “Cinderella” A tale of mistreated Cinderella and her horrible stepsisters.
